conclusion: Understand the v-t graph to calculate distance as area under curve.
Focus on the interval from 10 to 15 seconds.
Approximate the area under the curve using geometric shapes.
At 10 seconds, velocity is about 20 m/s; at 15 seconds, velocity is about 10 m/s.
Calculate area as a trapezoid: Area = 75 meters.
Consider curve shape; gradual decrease suggests area slightly less than 75 meters.
Final answer: Distance fallen is less than 75 meters.
